abstract: Student Opinion | Does wearing makeup really make women seem more "capable, reliable and amiable"?
snippet: Student Opinion | Does wearing makeup really make women seem more "capable, reliable and amiable"?
lead_paragraph: A new study has concluded that wearing makeup makes women more likable. Does this match your own observations? Why might cosmetics affect how a person is perceived?

headline.main: Do Attractive People Have Advantages Others Don't?
